description:
You have 8:46 minutes  to run from the police.    The point of this game is   not get pinned down  by the police, and also to   use your limited  time to listen and reflect on police brutality,  civil rights,   and  the assassination of George Floyd. 

I'm a college art student  in Portland.   This is the  first video game  I've ever made.   I'm living with my   parents due to   quarantine, and my  dad is high risk.   Therefore,   I can't   go to the protests.  This game is   part of   my way of protesting from home, and processing my emotions.  

I wouldn't donate any money to a crappy  amateur    game   like this.   However, any donations  made will do be donated   to the cause.

The audio clip  used is a  remix I  made featuring the  voices of Trump,  civil  right leaders, and protests.  The original  song is   "Hell March" from  the game Command & Conquer: Red Alert.
